summary: Female elf follower with Custom CBBE HDT body
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds to your game [b][color=#ff0000]Promise[/color][/b], a new follower. You can find her inside the [color=#ff0000]Temple of Talos in Windhelm[/color].
She is an archer with good skills - levels with the player - and is marriable and essential.
If you have [color=#ffff00]any questions/requests, send me a PM[/color]: I will answer everyone as soon as possible.

[b][color=#00ff00]Requirements[/color][/b]
As she has a Custom CBBE HDT body, you'd better install [color=#ffff00]xpmse skeleton[/color] and [color=#ffff00]HDT physics extensions[/color].


[b][color=#00ff00]Options[/color][/b]
Promise comes with a [color=#ff0000]Custom CBBE HDT body[/color] with [color=#ff0000]4k textures[/color]: you can choose the [color=#ff0000]Nude[/color] or [color=#ff0000]Armored[/color] version. If you don't like this busty body you can install the[color=#ffff00] CBBE Slim meshes[/color] I've provided as a patch. If you have any trouble with  4k textures there are [color=#ffff00]2k textures[/color] under optional files.
